test_id.content: Great place for coffee and work!

replies.replyId_1: I agree, the coffee is fantastic!
replies.replyId_2: The WiFi is also great for working!

test_id_2.content: Could use more seating during peak hours.

test_id_3.content: Is the cafe open late on weekends?

replies.replyId_1: Yes, they stay open until 10 PM on Saturdays and Sundays!
